refnamediv.refpurpose: Tell the raw Oracle data type of the field

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: oci_field_type_raw returns Oracle's raw data type of the field.

note.para: In PHP versions before 5.0.0 you must use ocicolumntyperaw instead. This name still can be used, it was left as alias of oci_field_type_raw for downwards compatability. This, however, is deprecated and not recommended.

refsect1.para: However, if you want to get field's type, then oci_field_type will suit you better. See oci_field_type for additional information.
